sentence.Network_en: She ruled more by entreaty and persuasion than by command or argument.
sentence.Network_cn: 她也不是靠发号施令和争辩,而是靠央求和规劝来管理的.

sentence.Network_en: Mrs. Quilp durst only make a gesture of entreaty.
sentence.Network_cn: 奎尔普太太仅能大着胆子做出一种哀求的姿势.

sentence.Network_en: Her gaze clung to him in entreaty.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的眼光带着恳求的神色停留在他身上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... tract n 一片土地；地带（拉长的一片地） entreaty n 恳求，请求 trbute n 赠品；赞扬.
专八词汇表_百度文库 ... energetic 积极的；精力旺盛的 entreaty 恳求，哀求 entrust 委托，付托.

请告诉我有关情绪的形容词20点! - Yahoo... ... Excited 激动的 Entreaty 哀求的 Hope 渴求的.

list.abs: Give to value in this entreaty headquarters , and work out an above problem ., 在此恳请总部给予重视 , 并解决以上问题.
to employ urgent persuasion or entreaty ., 力劝急切地劝告或请求.
make a solicitation or entreaty for something ; request urgently ., 为了某物恳求或者乞求 ; 迫切地要求.
he had returned when he did , on the pressing and written entreaty of a French citizen , who represented that his life was endangered by his absence .他之所以在那时回来是因为一个法国公民的催促和书面请求，那人说明他若不回来他就有生命之虞。
Give to value in this entreaty headquarters , and work out an above problem ., 在此恳请总部给予重视 , 并解决以上问题.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'treatment, management'; formerly also as intreaty): from entreat, on the pattern of treaty

entry.def: An entreaty is a very polite, serious request.

example.ex: The FA has resisted all entreaties to pledge its support to the campaign.
example.tran: 足协拒绝了一切希望它能承诺支持这次运动的请求。

sentences.sentence: "an appeal to the public to keep calm"

auth_sentence.content: Her winningly chipmunk-cheeked smile is doled out sparingly, a privilege to be earned, rather than an icebreaker or an entreaty.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her winningly chipmunk-cheeked smile is doled out sparingly, a privilege to be earned, rather than an icebreaker or an entreaty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her winningly chipmunk-cheeked smile is doled out sparingly, a privilege to be earned, rather than an icebreaker or an entreaty.

sentences.en: The tyrant was deaf to the entreaties of the slaves.
sentences.cn: 暴君听不到奴隶们的哀鸣。

sentences.en: We were all moved by her entreaties.
sentences.cn: 我们都被她的恳求所感动。

sentences.en: He began with entreaties and ended with a threat.
sentences.cn: 他先是恳求,最后是威胁。
